name: Galactic Slimes
description:
Welcome to Galactic Slimes
Fight your way through waves of Slimes in a retro-styled world!

Galactic Slimes is a very tiny game where you control a droid, armed with a four-directional laser gun. Waves of slimes spawn at multiple location, and it is your task to survive as long as possible!

Want to report a bug or keep up with this and future projects of mine? You can find me as @DelightedCat on Twitter!
